```{r setup}

devtools::load_all()

library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(eurostat)
library(tidyr)

data(naq_eurostat_dat)

```

# Eurostat

```{r}

naq_eurostat_dat_raw %>% 
  filter(unit == "CP_MNAC",
         na_item == "D1") %>% 
  drop_na(values) %>% 
  group_by(geo, nace_r2, s_adj) %>% 
  mutate(tmin = min(time), 
         tmax = max(time)) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  ggplot(aes(geo, ymin = tmin, ymax = tmax, colour = nace_r2)) +
    facet_wrap(~ s_adj) +
    geom_linerange(position = position_dodge(width = 0.5)) +
    coord_flip()

```


```{r}

naq_eurostat_dat_raw %>% 
  filter(nace_r2 == "TOTAL",
         na_item == "EMP_DC") %>% 
  group_by(geo, nace_r2, s_adj) %>% 
  mutate(tmin = min(time), 
         tmax = max(time)) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  ggplot(aes(geo, ymin = tmin, ymax = tmax, colour = unit)) +
    facet_wrap(~ s_adj) +
    geom_linerange(position = position_dodge(width = 0.5)) +
    coord_flip()

```
